name: DisPlaceMent (Nerdu)
description:
Made by Jordan and Nerdu for the Brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam

Description

Displacement is a game about making enemies kill each other, by moving, rotating and pushing them into desired locations. You use your special time powers of going forward and rewinding time to predict enemy paths, and use that information to get enemies to shoot where you want them to.

Controls

WASD to move

Hover and drag to rotate enemies in later levels

Space to move time forward

Ctrl to move time backward

Enter to skip quotes and tutorial segments(though it is highly recommended you do read them)

If, or if not, you enjoyed the game, please drop some feedback and rate it for the jam. Other than that, good luck with your other jam games as well!
